mapper.select: select subname from subjects order by subname
select anum,tnum,aname,tname,type,id,tid,pw,rrn1,rrn2,email,phone1,phone2,phone3,addr,joindate,t_image,subject,visa,tterm,twageratio,introduction from accounts,teachers where id=tid and anum=#{anum}
mapper.update: update accounts set aname=#{aname}, email=#{email}, phone1=#{phone1}, phone2=#{phone2}, phone3=#{phone3}, addr=#{addr} where anum=#{anum}
update teachers set tname=#{aname}, t_image=#{t_image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject=#{subject}, tterm=#{tterm}, introduction=#{introduction}, twageratio=#{twageratio}, visa=#{visa} where tnum=#{tnum}
